name: Glorium Technologies
description:
Glorium Technologies is the first healthcare-focused full-cycle app and software development company. Since the year 2010 Glorium helps digital health companies bring their new software products to market or add new features to the existing ones - all while reducing their development budget by providing resources from our development centers based in Ukraine and Belarus.
Some of the projects include EHR/EMR/HIS systems and its modules, HL7 integrations, DICOM/PACS imaging, chronic disease management and diagnostic platforms, analytics and dashboard solutions, telemedicine, devices connectivity and more.
The technology stack for the applications developed includes over 70 frameworks/technologies like .NET, Angular, JavaScript, ExtJS, iOS, Swift, MySQL, CSS,  PHP, Xamarin, ASP Core, PostgreSQL, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Unity, AWS, GCP, Azure, Android, ReactJS, NodeJS, Express, ElasticSearch, Microsoft SQL Server, ASP.NET, MVC, Angular Material, Java, Stripe JS and more.
What makes us different?
We focus solely on the healthcare industry and know how to deal with HL7, CHI, FHIR, HIPAA, HITECH, DICOM, NCPDP, LOINC, UMLS, ANSI, FDA, EMA, MU along with any other healthcare-specific standards/formats/regulations.
Start with a small pilot project to minimize risk and develop trust before we jump into a long-term engagement.
No charge for professional project management, it's on us.
Product advice based on our experience and background.
Agile approach with proper Scrum, this means frequent deliveries of your product to see the progress.
The dedicated project team, no out-of-the-blue people replacement.
Top-notch UX/UI by having the business analyst and designer to work together on your product.
Full transparency by sharing the project management and code repository tools with your team.
